healingHerbs.name: Healing Herbs
healingHerbs.description: Chance to heal up to 3 wounds on one hero.

boots.name: Thousand League Boots
boots.description: Gives one additional step for each move action.

giantsGlove.name: Giants Glove
giantsGlove.description: One additional attack die. Breaks locked doors.

ringOfPrecision.name: Ring of Precision
ringOfPrecision.description: May re-roll one completely missed attack.

crownOfWisdom.name: Crown of Wisdom
crownOfWisdom.description: One additional die roll when searching.

swordOfChaos.name: Sword of Chaos
swordOfChaos.description: A sword with a will of it's own. Use at your own peril.

potionOfSpeed.name: Potion of Speed
potionOfSpeed.description: Gives 2 additional actions. Can only be used once.
